name: Prison Escape (petergambell)
description:
A simple text-adventure game where you attempt to escape a prison. The game was created initially by following the lectures in the Complete Unity Developer course on Udemy: https://www.udemy.com/unitycourse/

The Prison text graphic comes from the course, but the story and choices you make have been fundamentally changed from how they originally appear in the course.

Choose wisely and good luck!

Note: If the game isn't responding to your keyboard presses, click on the game window with your left mouse button and it should become active and respond properly.
